Posts.Content: needtotalk wrote: Hi.  I was diagnosed with invasive lobular cancer yesterday.  I am going for a bone scan tomorrow and seeing the surgeon next Thursday.  My tumour is relatively small and Grade 1.  Does anyone know anything about any of this.  Of course, I am so scared.  Thank you. Dx 1/16/2008, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Diagnosed needtotalk lewisfamily503

Posts.Content: Jan 17, 2008 03:03PM needtotalk wrote: Thank you so much for answering.  Just those few comments (plus the Ativan I took 20 min ago) really helped.  Do you still feel somewhat peaceful and strong even if you are diagnosed late stage cancer.  Is it the fact that now you have some control?
